lom:description.lom:string: This paper addresses the issues surrounding students with disabilities in regular science classrooms. Concerns discussed include effective inclusive climates, special needs and science classes, preparing the classroom, adapting the curriculum and assessment, and inclusion and teacher attitude.

lom:title.lom:string: Science Classrooms for Students with Special Needs
